Question.Subject: Can you get paid for surveys?
Question.Content: I see soo much stuff for getting paid for surveys, i tried one and it gave me credits as dollars and never got paid and cant get ahold of them. Is there are REAL ways to get paid..please help.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes there is go into a great thing called the internet. Then go to a greater thing called google, Then ask your quest to the great google where he/she or may answer your request and give you your wish.................................................................................................................................. JUST FUCKIN DO ONE WHERE THEY WILL ASK FOR YOUR FUCKIN CARD DETAILS.
